Control Name: 3.10.3 Application logs are collected from different application environments.
Control Statement: Application logs support the end-to-end application lifecycle. Logging is essential in understanding how the application operates in various environments and what events occur and under which conditions.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 3.10 How are you monitoring to ensure the workload is scaling appropriately?
control_attributes.Control: 3.10.3 Application logs are collected from different application environments.
